desc: Order your Mobility Scooter or Electric Wheelchair from Zip’r Mobility. We are an American Family Owned Business and offer Free Shipping directly to your door! NO SALES TAX on our products. (WA excluded). Shop our collection of travel scooters and power wheelchairs.

layout.text: EXPAND YOUR FREEDOM WITH A MOBILITY SCOOTER
Designed for comfort and maximum portability. See why thousands have chosen the Zip'r Traveler 3 Wheel Mobility Scooter!
